name: [MZ] Battle with Army
description:
License: Free for personal or commercial use.

Context: By default, PRG MAKER allows up to 4 characters controlled by the player to participate in the battle. For games based on groups of characters larger than 4, this default setting is very inconvenient.

Description: This script allows the developer to increase the number of battle participants to 12.

Script configuration: It is necessary to configure the maximum number of characters that will be displayed inside and outside the battle.

This script is very simple and has no objective of causing profound changes in the battle system of the RPG MAKER MZ. Precisely for this reason it has a high level of compatibility with other plug-ins.

Attention: If you want to combine this plugin with my other plugin: POG_FormationControl, instead use the POG_FormationControlEX plugin, which already has this plugin "embedded" in it.

Extra function: noBattele (the power of love)

It is possible to prevent some characters from the group from entering the battle. For this you must:

  1. Set up a Status in the database to assign to the characters that will be left out of the battle.
  2. To configure the Status, just insert the <noBattle> tag in the Note field of the Database Status tab.
  3. Assign the Status configured with the <noBattle> tag to the characters who are out of the battle.

Attention: If all the characters are unable to engage in combat this can cause problems during the course of your game.
